price: ߒ߬ ߕߏߟߏ߲ߕߐ߫ ߡߊ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߣߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߕߍߝߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߊ߲߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
